title: Uncharted: Fora do Mapa
summary: The saga presents the first time that the young man goes out with his friend for a treasure hunt on a great trip that may, above all, make Nate find his lost brother.

title: Ice Age: The Adventures of Buck
summary: Buck, Crash and Eddie try to prevent the Lost World from being overrun by dinosaurs.

title: Hotel Transylvania: Transformers tron
summary: This is how Drac and his monster friends are turned into humans, while Van Helsing himself becomes a monster. In the face of confusion, the friends will have to find a way to get everyone back to their old ways.

title: Spider-Man: No homecoming
summary: the character Peter Parker (Tom Holland) in a big trouble. After being discovered as Spider-Man, he will have to face great challenges as he asks Dr Strange for help to have his identity forgotten but things do not go as planned, and now, in addition to everything, the hero will have to deal with the villains of several dimensions

title: Black Widow
summary: The story that takes place in the Marvel universe is a return to the origins of the famous heroine. Due to the Civil War that takes place in Captain America (2016), Natasha Romanoff needs to flee and hide from the government. That is when she ends up getting involved in an old conspiracy from her past, when she was a spy trained by the Russian secret services. Pursued by enemies new and old, the Avenger and former KBG agent must find a way to survive.

title: The favorite
summary: The plot takes place in 18th century England and shows Queen Anne weakened by a chronic illness while two women vie for her attention and influence in the kingdom.

title: Nomadland
summary: After the economic collapse of a business town in rural Nevada, Fern (Frances McDormand) packs her van and sets out on the road exploring a life outside conventional society as a modern nomad.

title: Central do Brasi
summary: The story begins at the Central train station in Brazil, in Rio de Janeiro. Dora is a bitter woman who makes a living writing letters to illiterate people. One day, life puts Joshua, a boy who has just lost his mother, in her path. Thus, the two begin a journey through the countryside of Brazil in search of the boys father.

title: I, Daniel Blake
summary: Actor Dave Johns plays Daniel Blake, a 59-year-old man who, after a serious health problem, is advised by his doctor to leave work. Thus, the protagonist begins a true saga in search of his rights.

title: Gifted
summary: Frank, a single man, raises his niece Mary, a child prodigy, alone. When the girl excels at school because of her math skills, her grandmother plans a future that could separate her from her uncle.

title: Borat Subsequent Moviefilm
summary: Always controversial and politically incorrect, Borat returns to the United States of America, with yet another satire on the country is culture. This time, the reporter is accompanied by Tutar, his teenage daughter, and the pair live unbelievable adventures.

title: Crazy Rich Asians
summary: Um grande sucesso com o público e a crítica, o filme conta a história de Rachel Chu, uma mulher que viaja até Singapura para conhecer a família do namorado, Nick Young. Chegando lá, descobre ela que os familiares dele fazem da alta elite da região.

title: Minha Mãe é Uma Peça 3
summary: Don Hermínia is, without a doubt, one of the most educated mothers in national fiction. This time, the protagonist is life got complicated: the daughter is pregnant, the son is getting married and the ex-husband has moved to the region. Faced with so many emotions, she realizes it is time to reinvent herself.

title: Jojo Rabbit
summary: The dramatic comedy is controversial and has divided critics, but it is intended to be a satire on hate speech and propaganda. Jojo is a German boy who wants to belong to the Hitler Youth and fantasizes about the dictator. Meanwhile, his mother hides Elsa, a Jewish girl, in the basement of their house.

title: The Big Lebowski
summary: Known simply as The Man, Jeff Lebowski is an unemployed man who leads a relaxed life, bowling with his friends. When his house is broken into and his favorite rug is vandalized, he discovers he is being mistaken for a millionaire of the same name.

title: Duna
summary: The plot, set in the distant future, follows the trajectory of Paul Atreides, the young descendant of an important family. His mission is to travel to Arrakis, a desert planet full of dangers, in search of a substance essential for human life.

title: Matrix Resurrectionsa
summary: This time, we find Neo given over to the simulation, leading an ordinary life and taking blue pills to stay unconscious. He even crosses paths with Trinity, but they dont remember each other. However, it does not take long for the protagonist to have a new awakening to reality.

title: Upgrade
summary: The Australian science fiction action thriller film was directed by Leigh Whannell and received rave reviews from audiences. The story is set in a dystopian future, when the protagonist Gray Trace loses his wife and is left with his body paralyzed during a violent robbery. an artificial intelligence that is also out for revenge.

title: Tenet
place: Denmark, Estonia, India, Italy, Norway, the United Kingdom and the United States
summary: The protagonist is a CIA agent who receives a mysterious mission from a secret organization called Tenet. Suddenly, he discovers that he has to travel back in time to stop a new world war.

title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
summary: An alien named Klaatu crosses the universe to reach Earth and warn humans of an upcoming global crisis. He meets renowned scientist Dr. Helen Benson, who, along with her son Jacob, must protect Earth is friendly alien.
